LanguageData.RttR_FuryEventLetter: From the distance come the echoes of a telltale shriek. A Fury is nearby. It will mind its own business if you mind yours, or you can try to tame or slay it and risk its wrath.
LanguageData.RttR_AnimalSpawnMultiplier: Race to the Rim spawn commonality multiplier
LanguageData.RttR_AnimalSpawnMultiplierTooltip: This multiplier will affect the spawn changes (commonalities) of ALL animals in this mod. For example, if set to 0.5 animals from the mod will spawn half as much as default (which is 1). If set to 2, you'll get twice as many as default, and so on. This only affects wild spawns.
